body_html:
Yes; see the NMT tutorial code here <https://github.com/tensorflow/nmt/blob/master/nmt/utils/iterator_utils.py#L197> (this buckets by sequence length + batches with padding). I believe tensor2tensor has similar code here <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensor2tensor/blob/master/tensor2tensor/utils/data_reader.py#L117> .
…

body:
Yes; see the NMT tutorial code here
<https://github.com/tensorflow/nmt/blob/master/nmt/utils/iterator_utils.py#L197>
(this
buckets by sequence length + batches with padding).  I believe
tensor2tensor has similar code here
<https://github.com/tensorflow/tensor2tensor/blob/master/tensor2tensor/utils/data_reader.py#L117>
.

> implemented using the old tf.train-based API.
